info.name: codebase-service-user
info.description: This collection provide all endpoints of backend codebase which implement user service

item.name: v1

formdata.description: Username should be unique and can be anythings, no strict rules

request.description:
API endpoint to Register a new user

> A successful registration returns user object

formdata.description: Username which registered in the system
Password should be matched with current password saved in the system

request.description:
API endpoint to Login a user

> A successful login returns access token and refresh token

API endpoint to generate a new pair of token

> A successful request returns new access token and refresh token

API endpoint to get user details

> A successful request returns user object

item.description:
This version contains following requests

*   Register a new user
*   Login a user by given credentials
*   Request a new pair of tokens (refresh token)
*   Get details for a user

item.name: v2

formdata.description: Username should be unique and in the format of email or ID mobile number (prefix of +62)
Password should be matched with current password saved in the system

request.description:
API endpoint to Register a new user

> A successful registration returns user object

formdata.description: Username which registered in the system
OTP send to user by email or sms contain 6 characters of number

request.description:
API endpoint to Verify a registered user

> A successful request returns success message

formdata.description: Username which registered in the system in the format of email or ID mobile number (prefix of +62)
Password should be matched with current password saved in the system

request.description:
API endpoint to Login a user

> A successful login returns access token and refresh token

API endpoint to generate a new pair of token

> A successful request returns new access token and refresh token

API endpoint to get user details

> A successful request returns user object

API endpoint to Logout a user

> A successful request returns success message

item.description:
This version extends v1 capability of verification mechanism and JWT revocation strategy.

It contains following requests

*   Register a new user
*   **Verify registered user by OTP**
*   Login a user by given credentials
*   Request a new pair of tokens (refresh token)
*   Get details for a user
*   **Logout a user**
